item.title: About Me
item.description:
My name is Sharat Visweswara, I live in Seattle and I design and build software at Evocalize. Prior to that I spent ~10 years building software systems at Amazon.

I mostly work on backend systems and focus on data integrity, system scalability and engineering productivity. I have deep expertise in relational databases and multi-tier architectures. I constantly encourage my team to build tools that make their lives easier and that tool-building is as important as product-building for long-term team productivity.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
It is so incredibly easy to set up a personal blog now. I’ve picked:

  • the Hugo static site generator.
  • the XMin theme to go with that.
  • and Github Pages for hosting.

The process is explained in this Quickstart and the Hosting on GitHub Pages guide. I spent about 20 minutes setting this up, and more than that trying to pick a theme.

Happy Blogging!
